scReadSim.scRNA_GenerateBAM.scRNA_BED2FASTQ¶

scReadSim.scRNA_GenerateBAM.scRNA_BED2FASTQ(bedtools_directory, seqtk_directory, referenceGenome_file, outdirectory, BED_filename_combined_pre, sort_FASTQ=True)[source]¶

Convert Synthetic reads from BED to FASTQ.

Parameters

  • bedtools_directory (str) – Directory of software bedtools.

  • seqtk_directory (str) – Directory of software seqtk.

  • referenceGenome_file (str) – Directory of the reference genome FASTA file that the synthteic reads should align.

  • outdirectory (str) – Output directory of the synthteic bed file and its corresponding cell barcodes file.

  • BED_filename_combined_pre (str) – Specify the base name of output bed file.

  • sort_FASTQ (bool (Default: True)) – Set True to sort the output FASTQ file.
